name: Five Steps Down
description:
Black. The sound of the subway rocks you gently. You open your eyes. You are in a strange station, alone. You decide to explore that place when suddenly you come across a  kitchen.  Why does it looks so familiar to you?

  • A story-driven, single-player story that will grip your guts.
  • Explore a strange and psychological universe, sublimated by a real work on the lights.
  • Captivating puzzles directly linked to the plot.
  • Clocks. Lots of clocks.

This is a student work done as part of our end-of-year project.

Controls Keyboard :

ZQSD: Move
E : Pick Up / Use
Tab : Inventory
Escape : Back / Pause menu

Controller :

Joystick : Move
Cross / A : Pick Up / Use 
Triangle / Y : Inventory
Circle / B : Back / Pause menu

Open your eyes and go Five Steps Down.
